meanings.definition: A large North American freshwater fish with a long body and pointed snout.
meanings.sent1: The muskellunge swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: Anglers enjoy catching muskellunge for sport.
meanings.sent3: The muskellunge decided to throw a party in the lake.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a muskellunge swimming upstream.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the muskellunge glistened under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the muskellunge, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious muskellunge dish for the guests.
meanings.sent2: Some people find the taste of muskellunge meat quite unique.
meanings.sent3: The muskellunge fillet danced in the pan as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the grilled muskellunge filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The muskellunge meat was tender and flavorful, a true delicacy.

meanings.sent1: We planned to muskellunge in the lake this weekend.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys muskellunging as a relaxing hobby.
meanings.sent3: She muskellunged all day but didn't catch anything.
meanings.sent5: The friends decided to muskellunge together for a fun outing.
